input.sentences: many people attended the celebration of the hometown team winning .
one man tries to rile up the crowd while wearing his favorite player 's jersey .
people started dancing when the team scored the last point in regulation .
the owner speaks to the crowd about the team 's accomplishments .
thousands look on as people rushed to center court .
output.sentences: The people lined up on either side of the court.
And they smiled and were very happy.
After the game every one lined up for a photo.
The stadium was packed with people
